def_cn: (作户外演讲时用的)临时小讲台
def_en: A soapbox is a small temporary platform on which a person stands when he or she is making a speech outdoors.

def_cn: (针对某事自己有强烈看法的)演讲，发表意见，书写感受
def_en: If you say that someone is on their soapbox, you mean that they are speaking or writing about something they have strong feelings about.
